name: Udrako Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Udrako Aviation (Pty) Ltd is a premier flight training institution located near Centurion, offering a comprehensive range of aviation programs. We provide both theoretical and practical flight training in a class-leading facility. Our services include Remote Pilot License (RPL) aeroplane training, drone training and licensing, Beyond Visual Line Of Sight (BVLOS) training, and preparation for Drone Remote Pilot Certificate (RPC) and other certifications. With a focus on excellence and safety, Udrako Aviation is committed to delivering high-quality training to aspiring pilots and drone operators, ensuring they are well-prepared for their careers in aviation. Our dedicated team and state-of-the-art facilities make us a trusted choice for aviation education.
